t: r/macbookpro on Reddit: What to look for in a dongle/adapter? Just picked up a MBP with 4 USB C ports. Amazon is flooded with them.
s: November 17, 2022 - I actually have 2 dongles, one that it's only a hdmi adapter to connect an external monitor and another which is the typical USB hub to connect the rest of stuff. There are some USB hubs that already contain everything like hdmi and so on, but are usually a bit more expensive or they don't have USB 3.0 ports. The best brand that is inexpensive for the quality that it offers is anker. ... Don’t go cheap. Amazon ...

t: Pair AmazonBasics Wireless Mouse with a different Dongle? - Peripherals - Linus Tech Tips
s: February 8, 2018 - I have a perfectly fine AmazonBasics wireless mouse and a perfectly fine dongle. But they don't match (lost dongle from it and mouse that it was paired to was broken). I'd like to pair the different mouse and dongle together. I don't see any software or way to do this. Anyone know of a way? Thanks.
